mapper.select: SELECT M1.meeting_no, M1.meeting_title, M1.meeting_date, M1.start_gather_date, M1.end_gather_date, M1.meeting_min, meeting_max, M1.exercise_no, M1.location1_no, M1.location2_no, M1.detail_location, M2.materials_name, M1.meeting_content FROM MEETING M1 FULL OUTER JOIN MATERIALS M2 ON M1.MEETING_NO = M2.MEETING_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETING VALUES (MEETING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{meeting_max}, #{meeting_min}, #{exercise_no}, SYSDATE, #{start_gather_date}, #{end_gather_date}, #{meeting_date}, #{location1_no}, #{location2_no}, #{meeting_title}, #{meeting_content}, 0, null, 0, #{detail_location}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(MEETING_NO) FROM MEETING WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
